title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message when there is no data for series
OB: The software does not provide a friendly error message when there is no data for a series.
EB: When there is no data for a series, the software should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Perform an action that should generate data for a series. 2. Remove all data for the series. 3. Observe that no friendly error message is displayed to remind the user that there is no data for the series.
